description: In a forgotten American town, five thrill-seeking teenagers decide to challenge the monotony by exploring an abandoned mansion, where they find a Ouija board. Unaware of the consequences, their curiosity leads them to unearth dark secrets and deep fears that inhabit the house and themselves, drastically altering their worldview. Local legends come to life, showing that the line between reality and fiction is thinner than it seems.
name: Ouija: They are Among us
intro: Five young people unleash dark secrets through a Ouija board, challenging their perception of reality and blurring the line between legends and fiction.
